author: rbb
msg: Remove ap_destroy_context from Apache 2.0.  With the name change back to
ap_pool_t, this function doesn't make sense.  This also changes all
references to ap_destroy_context back to ap_destroy_pool.

author: gstein
msg: pool->prog_data structures are allocated from within the pool. make sure to
clear them out when the pool is cleared.

msg: Remove all remaining instances in Apache code of

author: manoj
msg: Since cleanups return an APR status, ap_run_cleanup should too.
